docs.text: sam ( matthew broderick ) is an astronomer in a small american town and engaged to teacher linda ( kelly preston ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he is head over heels in love and lindas sudden departure to new york city to live with her new lover anton ( tch ? ky karyo ) comes as a complete surprise to him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but as we all know love is blind and so sam leaves for new york as well to win her back .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he moves into an abandoned house across the street from anton's apartment and installs a camera obscura to watch them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: suddenly anton's ex maggie shows up , but she does not want her former lover back .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: on the contrary , all she wants to do is vaporize him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she may say that she doesn't want to kill him , but the possibility doesn't bother her too much either .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after all , people die every day .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in spite of their different motives the two team up and fall for each other as things move on .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story sounds like something we all have seen a million times .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but we haven't .

docs.text: griffin dunne brings us the most charming comedy since " while you where sleeping " .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the camera obscura adds a " special something " to the movie and makes it an exceptional romantic comedy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everything about the movie is perfect , from set design to casting .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dialogues are inspired and the touches of black humor add a certain bite .

docs.text: meg ryan , known from " when harry met sally " or " sleepless in seattle " , surprises in a role that may finally help her get rid of her sweet little girl image .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she impresses the viewer as a maneating biker girl .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even more surprising is the fact that the viewer believes her , much more so than in last years " courage under fire " where she played a gulf war pilot .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: matthew broderick is the goodnatured and somewhat naive sam who has trouble accepting reality .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the viewer can tell that he doesn't only watch the stars but also tries to reach out for them .

docs.text: he has trouble keeping in touch with reality .

docs.text: she would do anything to harm anton .
